subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Teddy Tamgho of France set a world indoor record in the triple jump and Bernard Lagat unleashed a devastating kick in the final 250 meters to win the 3,000 meters at the world indoor championships in Doha, Qatar.
snippet: Teddy Tamgho of France set a world indoor record in the triple jump and Bernard Lagat unleashed a devastating kick in the final 250 meters to win the 3,000 meters at the world indoor championships in Doha, Qatar.
